com.cloudera.api.v3
Interface RootResourceV3

All Superinterfaces:
RootResourceV1, RootResourceV2
All Known Subinterfaces:
RootResourceV4, RootResourceV5, RootResourceV6
@Path(value="")
public interface RootResourceV3
extends RootResourceV2

The root of the Cloudera API (v3). Provides access to all sub-resources available in version 3 of the API.
